--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/20/03 1:10:48 AM Central Standard Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "It's time to reprogram this bot loyal to me"said Hydras while 
he 
> > started to reprogram the pod as Predacon and programing an 
> > abosloting loyalti to Hydras
> 
> She watched. Curiously, patiently.. her optics jumping 
continuously from the 
> bot to Hydras.  He obviously had that ingenius mind that Megatron 
had. The 
> more & more she was around him, the more she saw Megatron in him. 
So far, she 
> hadn't seen much of Galvatron.. which was a good thing, in her 
opinion.
